game.name: Nautikin Adventures
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 레이싱, 시뮬레이션
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Nautikins rule a vibrant ocean world! Build boats, planes, helicopters, and more to explore islands filled with wonder and peril. Unleash endless creativity with Sandbox mode or tackle challenges in Campaign. Embark with singleplayer or online multiplayer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nautikins rule a vibrant ocean world! Build boats, planes, helicopters, and more to explore islands filled with wonder and peril. Unleash endless creativity with Sandbox mode or tackle challenges in Campaign. Embark with singleplayer or online multiplayer.
